release.action: Incorporated code review changes before open sourcing.
Added corba example for the new custom RPC exporter functionality.
Add LineIterator, an iterator over lines read from a BufferedReader.
Add the RemoteStreamExporter and associated classes which allow the stream servers to be easily utilized within alternative RPC frameworks.
Added convenience IOIterator implementation ConverterIOIterator which is useful for implementing IOIterators which convert from one data type to another.
Add ability to specify chunk size for the underlying streams in remote iterator servers

Change RemoteRetry to catch and potentially retry any exception. Change current concrete retry impls to only handle RemoteException (so their behavior will be the same as it was before). Do not throw RemoteException by default from call() methods. These changes make RemoteRetry friendlier for use with ejb3 stuff.
add Proxy support to RemoteWrapper for simplified usage.
deprecate (Closeable)IOIterator.Adapter and add RmiioUtil.adapt method which returns a subclass of AbstractCloseableIOIterator (which will close the underlying iterator if it is Closeable).
make IOIteratorPipe.Source extend RemoteStreamMonitor so that it will get automagically closed if used with a SerialRemoteIteratorServer.

Added CloseableIOIterator convenience interface. Made all IOIterator and Closeable implementations implement this interface instead. Added AbstractCloseableIOIterator which implements closing using a variety of common mechanisms.
Move some utility classes into a utility sub-package.

Add noDelay functionality to PacketInputStream. Change implementation of EncodingInputStream to make it more effective in noDelay mode. Add addtional constructors to encoding based iterators to allow for noDelay remote iterators.
Change SerialRemoteIteratorServer to attempt to use localIterator as the stream monitor if none is explicitly provided and the localIterator implements the relevant interface.
InputStreamAdapter and OutputStreamAdapter for customizing stream handling based on whether or not the underlying stream is packet based.
Add SimpleRemoteIterator, which is implementation of RemoteIterator suitable for small collections.
Initial release as separate rmiio project.
